task_description: An interactive shopping cart that allows users to drag items to a designated area and view their total cost. We have four items to choose from: The Essence of JavaScript ($40), JavaScript: The Definitive Guide ($120), Mastering JavaScript ($35), and The Art of DOM Programming ($50).

modules.module_description: Handles the drag and drop actions of shopping items.
Displays the total cost of items and Selected info of items in the shopping cart.
Handles the backend logic for calculating the total price of items in the cart.

user_requirement_list.user_requirement_description: User can drag items from the product list and drop them into the cart area.

test_cases.test_case_description: Verify that a valid item dragged to the cart is added successfully.
steps: Drag 'The Essence of JavaScript' to the cart area and drop it.
test_cases.expected_result: 'The Essence of JavaScript' is added to the cart with a quantity of 1.

test_cases.test_case_description: Verify that dragging an existing item in the cart updates the quantity.
steps: Drag 'The Essence of JavaScript' to the cart area and drop it.
Drag 'The Essence of JavaScript' to the cart area and drop it again.
test_cases.expected_result: The quantity of 'The Essence of JavaScript' is updated to 2.

user_requirement_list.user_requirement_description: Users can see the total amount for all items added to the cart.

test_cases.test_case_name: Display Correct Total for Single Item
test_cases.test_case_description: Verify that the total amount reflects the price of a single item added to the cart.
steps: Drag 'The Essence of JavaScript' to the cart area and drop it.

test_cases.test_case_description: Verify that the total updates correctly when multiple items are added.
steps: Drag 'The Essence of JavaScript' to the cart area and drop it.
Drag 'JavaScript: The Definitive Guide' to the cart area and drop it.
Drag 'The Art of DOM Programming' to the cart area and drop it.
